channel.title: Error when I lowered stats of an item
channel.description:
Honestly, I got no idea what happened, 377 base, any ideas would be great esspecialy if you have a 377 because you will probably be able to see where it says the error points are.
[code]Exception in thread "main" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 6 at ItemHandler.loadItemList(ItemHandler.java:283) at ItemHandler.<init>(ItemHandler.java:173) at server.main(server.java:111)[/code]
A little note: I also removed the stats of the black armor that have bee nannoying on most servers and after i did and compiled this is what I got.

item.title: Error when I lowered stats of an item
item.dc:creator: @monkeykid300 monkeykid300
item.description:
@monkeykid300 wrote:

Thats strange because I did use tabs, but ill try looking for spaces. Im pretty sure I didnâ€™t use spaces.

I just double checked it over, maybe I did something on accident, cause I cant find any spaces.

Any other ideas?

Read full topic
item.source: Error when I lowered stats of an item

item.title: Error when I lowered stats of an item
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

You used spaces instead of tabs within a configuration file. In this case, it is your ItemHandler configuration file. Always use tabs rather than spaces in these types of files.

Read full topic
item.source: Error when I lowered stats of an item
